faction.name: Atom Barons of Santagria
faction.description: Armies of the Atom Barons of Santagria (A.B.S.) are cobbled from available resources according to need rather than any cohesive doctrine. The stratification of post-nuclear Santagrine society is reflected in their forces' compositions, with archaically-armed common levies sharply contrasted by the artful opulence of the airborne nobility. Above all else, Santagrines are dangerous because of their unpredictability.

specialRules.name: Flower of the Atom
specialRules.description: Forward air control does not task a knight: it only humbly requests he pursue a specific target. Instead of moving, a plane with this rule that has not yet fired may choose to lose its current mission target and tilt.

specialRules.name: Leviathan (X)
specialRules.description: Whether rolling or flying, this monstrosity takes incredible punishment to kill. This unit must suffer X number of kills to be destroyed. When it suffers a kill, place a leviathan token on it and choose one non-Small Arm weapon on its statline to be destroyed.

specialRules.name: Tercio
specialRules.description: Santagrine levies usually fight in archaic, pre-arranged formations, sacrificing flexibility for mass. Units with this rule may be deployed in a special tercio formation consisting of three infantry units placed into mutual basal contact in a triangle.

units.name: VBD.127-DB CASTELLAN
units.unitAbility: Whenever this unit scores a kill on an enemy Vehicle, it may Rally a friendly unit within 8".

shotTypes.name: 14-lb Plutonium Core
specialRules: Roll a D6 for each unit in the radius. If the result is above the unit's Quality, it takes max pin, otherwise it takes one pin.

units.name: PAGES
units.unitAbility: This unit may activate to call a plane mission during the Support Phase, replace a friendly TACOM's turn.

units.name: CB.76 MISERICORDE
units.unitAbility: May fire while carrying desanting infantry and can carry PC(3) desants instead of PC(2)

units.name: VC.44R WHIRLWIND
units.unitAbility: This unit pays an additional 1" when rotating left. When rotating right, the rotation is free up to 180 degrees.

units.name: VAUBAN
units.unitAbility: If the CWIS has not been destroyed this unit gains APS(6+, Infinite). This APS has infinite ammo but may only trigger once per round and only against Guided Missiles.

weapons.name: Bolt Action Rifle, various make & caliber
Bolt Action Rifle, various make & caliber
